name: Castle Dash
description:
Title: Castle Dash

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview: Your horse has been stolen by an army of guards and an angry bird! Go to the castle and get your horse back! Dodge arrows and cannons while overcoming obstacles to reach the castle and get your horse, he misses you. 

Instructions: Use ASDW or the arrow keys to move around. Use your mouse to look around. Use the space bar to jump, and press it twice in succession to double jump. Hit Tab to pause the game. 

Game Design Team: Shelby Hiens - Game Designer
